QuestData.Title: In Search of Bigger Game
QuestData.Description: Well, $n, you've certainly proven your mettle as a hunter of all kinds of game animals -- rhinos, cats, and crocolisks. For some members of the expedition, these creatures are sufficient to test their hunting skills, but others, like myself, crave larger challenges.$B$BDorian Drakestalker went north, across Bittertide Lake and established a camp there. He's heard rumors of gigantic primordial drakes. Just imagine what a quarry they would be! Go check up on Dorian and see if he's had any luck.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Dorian Drakestalker at Dorian's Outpost in Sholazar Basin.
QuestData.RewardText: So old Hemet didn't forget about me, after all. I suppose he's going to want to participate in the hunt once we've done all the hard work. Don't worry, there are plenty of drakes to go around. Hemet will get his wish.
